page.title: 15THE CLOTHES PEOPLE WEAR
page.content: I try to wear things that are in fashion,like a blouse with a tie or a plain skirt with big pockets and dresses with no waistband,but a bigwide skirt at the bottom.Socks with little trimmings(pom poms) beads and studs are fashionable,cotton,nylon and polyester are the main materials.Fluorescent socks (worn odd)are in fashion green,pink,orange,yellow and blue.The fashionable jeans are either slack or tight so baggy or short zip-ups or button ups are very fashionable.Jelly bean sandals look nice but are slowly going out of fashion(jelly bean sandals are plastic)Ankle chains are fashionable with boys.Big chunky necalaces and bracelets with big and bright coloured earings are in fashion.Shoes with pointed toes are slip-ons are the fashion.
